classification_data.text: Julio César Suaza Contador Público EL SUSCRITO CONTADOR PÚBLICO JULIO CÉSAR SUAZA, IDENTIFICADO CON LA CÉDULA DE CIUDADANÍA No. 14.963.157 DE SANTIAGO DE CALI y TARJETA PROFESIONAL No. 9881-T C E R T I F I C A Q U E: 1º.) A la fecha, la composición Accionaria de la sociedad MEGASERVICIOS DE INGENIERÍA S.A.S., con NIT: 805.031.602 – 7, es de 2.000 acciones con un valor nominal de $ 50.000 cada acción, para un: CAPITAL AUTRIZADO $ 800.000.000 CAPITAL SUSCRITO $ 704.200.000 CAPITAL PAGADO $ 430.000.000 ACCIONISTA DORA MATILDE TREJOS PUERTA, C.C. 31.953.854 | 50.000 | 50% | 7.042 JUAN CARLOS ESCOBAR WELSCH, C.C. 16.733.280 | 50.000 | 50% | 7.042 TOTAL | | | 14.084 2º.) Este certificado se expide por solicitud expresa del señor JUAN CARLOS ESCOBAR WELSCH, representante Legal de MEGASERVICIOS INGENIERIA S.A.S., NIT: 805.031.602 – 7, para trámites legales, comerciales y/o bancarios. Para constancia de los anterior, se firma en la ciudad de Cali, a los veintitres (23) días del mes de septiembre de dos mil veinte (2020). JULIO CÉSAR SUAZA Revisor Fiscal T. P. No. 9881 – T E-Mail: julicesua@gmail.com Móvil: 315 4962850 Cel. 315 496 2850 E-mail julicesua@hotmail.com Cali - Colombia

ACCIÓN, PARTICIPACIÓN ACCIONARIA, NÚMERO DE ACCIONES] ACCIONISTA DORA MATILDE TREJOS PUERTA, C.C. 31.953.854 | 50.000 | 50% | 7.042 JUAN CARLOS ESCOBAR WELSCH, C.C. 16.733.280 | 50.000 | 50% | 7.042 TOTAL | | | 14.084 2º.) Este certificado se expide por solicitud expresa del señor JUAN CARLOS ESCOBAR WELSCH, representante Legal de MEGASERVICIOS INGENIERIA S.A.S., NIT: 805.031.602 – 7, para trámites legales, comerciales y/o bancarios. Para constancia de los anterior, se firma en la ciudad de Cali, a los veintitres (23) días del mes de septiembre de dos mil veinte (2020). [SIGNATURE] JULIO CÉSAR SUAZA Revisor Fiscal T. P. No. 9881 – T E-Mail: julicesua@gmail.com Móvil: 315 4962850 Cel. 315 496 2850 E-mail julicesua@hotmail.com Cali - Colombia ``` ## 2. PRIORITY CHECKS - BLANK: Not applicable, document has meaningful content - LINK_ONLY: Not applicable, document has substantial content beyond hyperlinks ## 3. ISSUER IDENTIFICATION - This document is issued by Julio César Suaza, a public accountant (Contador Público) - It is not issued by DIAN or Chamber of Commerce - It appears to be a certification from a corporate entity's fiscal reviewer ## 4. DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS The document serves to certify the shareholding structure of a company called MEGASERVICIOS DE INGENIERÍA S.A.S. It provides: - Shareholder names, percentages, and number of shares - Capital breakdown (authorized, subscribed, paid) - Specific ownership data with percentages (50% each for two shareholders) - It has clear ownership structure documentation ## 5. CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION Let me evaluate the document against each category: CECRL: No, this is not a personal identification document. RUT: No, this is not issued by DIAN nor is it a tax registration document. CERL: No, this is not issued by Chamber of Commerce nor is it certifying legal existence. ACC: YES, this document explicitly certifies the shareholding structure: - Uses terminology "composición Accionaria" (shareholding composition) - Contains ownership percentages (50% for each shareholder) - Lists shareholder names with ID numbers - Includes number and value of shares - Is certified by a fiscal reviewer RUB: No, this is not about beneficial ownership transparency nor issued by DIAN. POR_REVISAR: Not necessary as the document clearly fits the ACC category. ## 6. CONFIDENCE VALIDATION Strong evidence for ACC: - Clear "composición Accionaria" (shareholding composition) terminology - Includes complete ownership data with percentages (50% each) - Lists shareholders with identification numbers - Provides share values and quantities - Certification issued by fiscal reviewer (Revisor Fiscal) I am highly confident this document should be classified as ACC. Therefore, the final classification is: ACC (Documents that certify the ownership structure and shareholding composition of a company)
